Classes/ProgressBar.html#/s:14ProgressBa.name: init(trackColour:barColour:roundedCorners:cornerRadii:)
Classes/ProgressBar.html#/s:14ProgressBa.abstract: Initializes the progress bar instance and (optionally) rounding the given corners,

Classes/ProgressBar.html#/s:14ProgressBa.name: setupProgressBar(in:)
Classes/ProgressBar.html#/s:14ProgressBa.abstract: Sets up the progress bar within the given container view.

Classes/ProgressBar.html#/s:14ProgressBa.name: setProgressBarValue(to:)
Classes/ProgressBar.html#/s:14ProgressBa.abstract: Animates the progress bar from 0 until the given percentage value (in decimal number)
